name: Migrateful
slogan: Refugees teach their traditional cuisines in cookery classes
description:
Migrateful helps refugees and asylum seekers on their journey to employment and independence and promotes integration. It runs cookery classes led by migrant chefs struggling to integrate and access employment due to legal and linguistic barriers. The cookery classes provide ideal conditions not just for learning English and building confidence, but also for promoting contact and cultural exchange with the wider community.

We train our chefs through weekly workshops, taking them on a journey from passionate home cook to confident cookery class teacher. When our chefs feel ready, they deliver evening cookery classes to paying customers. These paid classes take place in cafes, or customers can host a class in their own home for themselves and their friends. Since Migrateful was founded in July 2017, we have run 600 cookery classes with 6000 participants and now have 26 chefs from from 20 different countries.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description:
Migrateful is recruiting an Operations Manager to support us with our daily operations, liaising with our chefs, venues and facilitators to run our cookery classes and events

Job description: 

Create menus with the chefs for cookery classes
Coordinating cookery class rota and publishing events 
Managing relationships with venues and dealing with requirements for specific venues 
Recruiting cookery class facilitators
Managing cookery class facilitators 
Dealing with complaints and emergencies
Overseeing that operations are running smoothly such as facilitators having correct equipment
Person specification:

Proven skills and knowledge in delivering cookery classes or events desirable 
Strong communication and interpersonal skills and the ability to deal with, and have empathy for a diverse range of people including vulnerable groups
Organised, with a knack for Excel and efficient email correspondence
Proficient in Microsoft Office, Mailchimp, Eventbrite and Salesforce desirable 
Ability to take initiative, be flexible and think creatively
Flexible in responding to out of hour emergencies 
Enthusiasm, energy and a positive attitude
To be invested in Migrateful’s mission
We particularly welcome applicants with a refugee background

Please send cover letter and CV to jess@migrateful.org by 15th January 2020

Interviews will take place on the 22nd and 23rd January 2020

Location: Migrateful Office, International House, Brixton
